articles.title: It's only taken 17 years: Apple could finally offer this Android home screen feature on iOS 18 - Android Authority
articles.description: Android has long allowed relatively robust app icon arrangements on the home screen, and this could come to iPhones in iOS 18.
articles.content:
• Apple will reportedly take inspiration from Android for home screen customization on iOS 18.
  • The company could apparently let users create blank spaces and rows between app icons.
